alert.note: Alert for Bates (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 9:01AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Miami, Linn and Bates Counties through 930 AM CDT... At 901 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Linn Valley, or over La Cygne, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Osawatomie, Butler, Adrian, Rich Hill, Pleasanton, La Cygne, Mound City, Drexel, Linn Valley, Hume, Parker, Fontana, Amsterdam, Amoret, Foster, Merwin, Passaic, Worland, New Lancaster and Beagle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
